item.description:
FYI on agenda for next week's XcellR8 meeting...

 

Our next XcellR8 meeting will be Thursday, April 11th - 8:00 am at Nerac.

We’ve all experienced it at one point or another – the nagging idea that lingers, the recurring thoughts about a potential opportunity and the associated doubts regarding the marketplace realities.

John Fantry is looking for your opinion. He’s bringing his idea into the harsh light of day and asking you the question, go or no-go. During this session of XcellR8, you will be tasked with assessing whether John’s idea (or some variant) is one that merits further refinement and execution, one that can benefit from the aggregation of the right combination of talent and resources, or as John says, simply consigned to the circular file. It’s decision time.

I look forward to seeing you. Please do let me know if you’ll be able to attend. Thank you.

Regards,

Kevin

http://ct.org/Growth_Network.asp
item.how_to_find_us: Information only. Please RSVP through event details below.
item.name: Xcellr8 Innovation Cell
